name: sketchfab
description: Sketchfab opens a new era of creativity by enabling anyone to easily publish and find 3D content online. With a community of millions of creators.

name: polyheaven
description: Poly Haven is a library of high-quality textures and 3D models. All files are released under the CC0 license, which means you can use them in personal or commercial projects without having to give credit.

name: mixamo
description: Mixamo is an online animation service that allows you to customize and animate 3D characters. Mixamo offers ready-to-use animations for 3D characters, saving time and money.

name: turboSquid
description: TurboSquid is an online marketplace for 3D models, textures, and 3D files. TurboSquid offers high-quality 3D models for games, movies, advertising, and architectural visualization.

name: react-three-fiber
description: React Three Fiber is a 3D rendering library for React. It allows you to create interactive 3D applications using React and Three.js.

name: react-three-rapier
description: React Three Rapier is a 3D physics library for React Three Fiber. It allows you to simulate rigid bodies, soft bodies, joints, constraints, and collisions in a 3D environment.

name: react-three-cannon
description: React hook for cannon-es. Use 3D physics in React Three Fiber.

name: react-three-editor
description: A 3D editor for React Three Fiber.

name: react-three-drei
description: Collection of utility components for React Three Fiber.

name: camera-controls
description: Camera controls for Three.js.

name: three.js editor
description: An online 3D editor for Three.js.

name: theatre.js
description: Motion design editor for the web.

name: triplex
description: The 3D editor for React Three Fiber.

name: gltf to r3f
description: Convert glTF files into React Three Fiber components.

name: gltfjsx cli
description: Turns GLTFs into JSX components.

name: shap-e
description: Generate 3D objects conditioned on text or images.

name: three.js
description: Three.js is a JavaScript library for creating real-time 3D animations in a web browser. It is based on WebGL and enables the creation of interactive 3D scenes.

name: draco
description: Draco is a library for compressing and decompressing 3D geometric meshes and point clouds. It aims to improve the storage and transmission of 3D graphics.

name: r3f-perf
description: Easily monitor your ThreeJS performance.

name: model-viewer
description: 3D model viewer supporting glTF 2.0 and PLY (3D Gaussian Splats).

name: monstermash
description: Monster Mash is a new sketch-based modeling and animation tool.
